ADD_WAST_TESTS(
    SOURCES simd_address.wast
            simd_align.wast
            simd_load.wast
            simd_store.wast
            simd_const.wast
            simd_splat.wast
            simd_lane.wast

            simd_i16x8_cmp.wast
            simd_i32x4_cmp.wast
            simd_f32x4_cmp.wast
            simd_i8x16_arith.wast
            simd_i16x8_arith.wast
            simd_i32x4_arith.wast
            simd_f32x4_arith.wast
            simd_boolean.wast
            simd_bit_shift.wast
            simd_bitwise.wast
            simd_i8x16_sat_arith.wast
            simd_i16x8_sat_arith.wast
            simd_f32x4.wast
            simd_conversions.wast
            simd_load_splat.wast)
